named-query.name: Drm.findDrmTree
named-query.query: select drm from Drm drm join FETCH drm.drmType drmType left join FETCH drm.media media where drm.userId=? and media.isrc=?

named-query.name: Drm.findDrmAndDrmTypeTree
named-query.query: select drm from Drm drm join FETCH drm.drmType drmType where drm.userId=?
